name: Clockwork Media
tag_list: advertising, marketing, digital, viral, video, film, blog, social-media, networking, grassroots, live-event, activations, action-sports, motorsports, automotive, car, agency, production, web, internet, design, mobile, apps, ios, ipad, iphone, website, mic
overview:
Clockwork Media is a digital marketing agency and production team specializing in video, web design, graphics, mobile apps, social media, live events, and brand campaigns.

Based in Orange County and Los Angeles, California, Clockwork Media is an expert at creating youth-oriented, high-impact marketing campaigns and the content used to support them. From live events to cross-country marketing activations to viral Internet campaigns, our edge is in finding your consumer and speaking their language.
